tool.name: gff_to_db.py
tool.description: Create a database from a gff file or add to an excisting database.
tool.command:
gff_to_db.py #if $gff and $gff is not None: --gff $gff #end if
#if $database and $database is not None: --database $database #end if $forceOV $backup
#if $idSpec and $idSpec is not None: --idSpec $idSpec #end if
#if $merge and $merge is not None: --merge $merge #end if
#if $fieldKey and $fieldKey is not None: --fieldKey $fieldKey #end if > $default

param.label: forcefully overwrites an excisting database, else adds the data to it (--forceOV)
param.name: forceOV

param.label: creates a backup before adding to the database (--backup)
param.name: backup

param.label: a coma seperated list for the construction of the primary key, the first arguments will be prioritized (--idSpec)
param.name: idSpec

param.label: use GFF field value as primary key (--fieldKey)
param.name: fieldKey
